bibl.title: Letter from Walter Reed to the Surgeon General, September 2, 1874

div1.p: Reed acknowledges the receipt of the invitation to appear before Army Medical Examination Board. [Courtesy of the National Archives and Records Administration]

div1.head: Letter from Walter Reed to the Surgeon General, September 2, 1874
div1.opener:
3207. SGO, 1874.
Brooklyn, Sept. 2, 1874.
Walter Reed,
Rect of Invitation
to appear before Army
Med. Ex'g. Board.
115 Lee Ave.
Brooklyn,
Sept, 2nd
To the Surgeon Genl
Washington, D.C.
Sir:
div1.p:
I have
the honor to acknowledge the
receipt of your letter, exten-
ding to me an invitation to
appear before the Army
Exam. Board for examination.
